title: Update Content Standards Request
description: Request parameters for updating an existing content standards configuration. Creates a new version.

standards_id.description: ID of the standards configuration to update

scope.description: Updated scope for where this standards configuration applies

countries_all.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. Standards apply in ALL listed countries (AND logic).

channels_any.description: Advertising channels. Standards apply to ANY of the listed channels (OR logic).

languages.description: BCP 47 language tags (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'fr'). Content is evaluated in these languages.

policy.description: Updated natural language policy describing acceptable and unacceptable content contexts.

calibration_exemplars.description: Updated training/test set to calibrate policy interpretation. Can be used to incrementally add exemplars.

oneOf.description: Simplified domain reference for quick calibration setup

type.description: Indicates this is a domain-level reference

language.description: BCP 47 language tag for content on this domain
